hints.content:
Let's show the $85$ treats divided among $8$ seals.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: An array of 85 circles arranged in 8 rows of 10 circles each shaded green and 1 row of 5 circles shaded pink. !

hints.content:
There are $\maroonD5$ dots remaining without a group. These dots are the **remainder**.

Each dot represents $\maroonD{1}$ treat that is left after George divides all the treats evenly.
The remainder represents the number of treats left after George divides the treats.

question.content:
The zookeeper George has $85$ treats to divide evenly among $8$ seals. George divides to see how many treats to give to each seal. George will have as few treats left as he can.

$85\div8=10\text{ remainder }5$  

**Which of the following describes the remainder in this case?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: The number of treats that each seal gets.
The number of treats left after George divides the treats.
